properties.description: This initiative has been deprecated. The Azure Security Benchmark v2 policy set is now represented in the consolidated Azure Security Benchmark initiative, which also serves as the Azure Security Center default policy initiative. Please assign that initiative, or manage its policies and compliance results within Azure Security Center
